svg.text: From Generation to Consumption: Modern Power Grid Architecture

g.text: Global Generation Mix: Coal 37% | Gas 24% | Hydro 16% | Nuclear 10% | Renewables 13%
Smart Grid: AMI, Demand Response, Distributed Generation, Energy Storage, Grid Analytics
Peak Demand: Summer 3-7 PM | Winter 6-10 AM & 5-9 PM | Base Load: 24/7 Industrial & Data Centers
" Frequency regulation with variable renewable sources
" Power quality maintenance with diverse loads
" Protection against cyber attacks on critical infrastructure
" Secure communication protocols for smart grid
Future Grid: AI/ML Optimization, Blockchain Transactions, 5G Communications, IoT Integration
